author: ekoneil
msg: Completion of the tagId work in the data grid.  This change adds a new tag <netui-data:row> which can be nested inside of the <netui-data:header>, <netui-data:rows>, and <netui-data:footer> tags in order to set HTML attributes (including the tagId) on the <tr>s generated by the data grid.

The <row> tag is completely optional; in its absence, the <rows> tag will still render the table row.  When the <row> tag is used, the "renderRow" flag on <header>, <rows>, and <footer> must be set to "false" in order to keep from rendering two table rows.  For example:

author: gdamour
msg: Reverse the temporary fix; after second review, I have been able to figure out
how to fix axis. The JIRA issue tracking the fix is: AXIS-1959.

msg: examples: Initial support for running the examples. Need to update the docs soon.
